Text: Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ nañwa ñw abo Israe̩l ku ma je̩ ñw ame̩no̩ga ikpemute du kwef uru-i dufu, kpai e̩ne̩ du kʼo̩la-wñ arʼe̩ño̩ kpai e̩ne̩ kʼoku e̩wñ fʼu o̩la daji;
tʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩, tʼonobule̩ me̩ na je̩ ñwu ma dufu, e̩jo̩do̩da uru-i oñ me̩ aje̩ ñwu ma jo̩, kʼama ki we efʼuru-ma daji, e-kʼomi gugu alumeji-wñ-i.
Tak abo Israe̩l fʼabe̩le̩ che, ma la je̩ ñwu ma nyʼejo̩do̩da uru le̩; alu ku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s, alu le̩ abo Israe̩l che.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ fʼe̩wñ adure e-kʼamone̩ che che, kʼi la fʼudu Jihofa fe̩, kʼonugo e̩ne̩ le̩ fʼabi je̩,
mak i agbalu e̩wñ adure kʼi che le̩; oñ i adʼe̩wñ akoji udu ki fe̩ ki chʼeju-wñ yiili wa, oñ i ñʼadʼukpe̩lu-wñ mʼo̩, tak i ako ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi fʼudu-wñ.

Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ ma nʼefu o̩pio̩o̩ kʼi adʼe̩wñ akoji ñw u tod abi kʼi je̩ le̩ n, mak e̩wñ akoji tod abi kʼi je̩ che e-Jihofa oñ atama ki mʼu du; e-le̩ anʼoji okolo e-e̩boma e-ku ma aduwa che e̩wñ e̩boma todu-wñ.
Oñ e̩wñ du ku ma du nyʼate̩ ki jʼef e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-abo Israe̩l ku ma ko wa ñw atama, owñ ne̩.
Owñ la ane̩ e̩wñ e̩ne̩ du kiafo̩, e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ako ñw atama, owñ ne̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu Mose̩s kakini,
E̩ naka ñw abo Israe̩l kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼo̩ya one̩ mʼe̩re̩ dutinyo̩, kʼi la fʼabi o̩ko̩-wñ je̩,
kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bʼo̩ dachi kʼi mʼo̩la da, kʼi la maja ñw o̩ko̩-wñ, kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ daji maja maja, kʼi ma la nʼe̩ne̩ ki agba ibenu nyʼu n, ku ma ma mu ef e̩wñ kʼi ache le̩ n;
kʼe̩do̩ achʼe̩ko̩-wñ ñwe̩ñwe̩le̩, kʼi chane̩ etejane̩ o̩ya-wñ kʼi mudaji le̩; abe̩k e̩gba kʼe̩do̩-wñ achʼo ñwe̩ñwe̩le̩, kʼi atejane̩ o̩ya-wñ, kʼi ma la dʼo̩la ji n;

e̩gbale̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ adʼu o̩ya-wñ wʼugbo atama, oñ i ako e̩wñ O̩jo̩-wñ wa tod onobule̩-wñ, owñ chʼukpe̩gwa e̩fa omu barli; i ki dʼekpo danyʼu n, i ki la adu frankinse̩ns tʼoji-wñ n, todu e̩wñ ele e-ogu eja i che, e̩wñ ele e-urewa de̩, kʼi aje̩ ñwu ma rewa udu ku ma fe̩.
Tak atama le̩ adʼonobule̩ le̩ wa me̩ru, kʼi la aje̩ ñw u dago o̩gba Jihofa;
tak atama ane̩ omiofo kiafo̩ kʼi dʼef ucha ku ma nʼama bo̩, oñ i abʼebutu ki dʼane̩pe̩te̩ ef uña ugugu nyʼomiofo le̩.

Tak atama aje̩ ñw onobule̩ le̩ dago o̩gba Jihofa, tak i amʼonobule̩ le̩ oji tu, kʼi adʼe̩wñ ele e-urewa le̩ tef o̩wo̩-wñ, owñ chʼe̩wñ ele e-ogu-eja le̩. Oñ atama ane̩ omi e̩rikoko kʼi aje̩ ñw ama mu ef ewo-wñ.

Tak atama aje̩ ñw u go̩, oñ i aka ñw onobule̩ le̩ kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma bʼe̩ dachi n, kʼe̩ ma la dʼe̩re̩ tinyo̩ tef e̩wñ e̩daji n, abu kʼo̩ko̩-we̩ nʼuwe̩-i, mak omi e̩rikoko ki aje̩ ñw ama mʼone̩-i kʼi fʼo̩wo̩ gwʼe̩ oji.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ mʼe̩re̩ du tinyo̩ abu kʼo̩ko̩-we̩ nʼuwe̩, i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼo̩la-we̩ daji, kʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ omune̩ bʼuwe̩ dachi,

(tak atama ki dʼule nyʼu ñw onobule̩ le̩, oñ atama le̩ aka ñw onobule̩ kakini,) Jihofa ki dʼuwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ina kpai e̩ne̩ kʼama amu alumeji amone̩-we̩, owñ chʼe̩gba ku Jihofa je̩ ñw uta-we̩ gbe̩, kʼefu-we̩ awu;
omi ki aje̩ ñw ama mu-i kʼi nyʼef ifu-we̩, kʼi la je̩ ñw efu-we̩ wu kʼuta-we̩ ki gbe̩ rinyo̩. Tak onobule̩ le̩ akakini, Ami, ami.
Tak atama le̩ ako̩ o̩la ama-i nyʼalo, kʼi la fʼu gwe̩ nyʼomi e̩rikoko le̩;
oñ i aje̩ ñw onobule̩ le̩ ñmo̩ omi e̩rikoko kʼi aje̩ ñw ama mu le̩, tak omi ki aje̩ ñw ama mu le̩ agudu wʼefu-wñ kʼi ka nyʼefu.
Tak atama agba e̩wñ ele e-ogu eja le̩ bʼo̩wo̩ onobule̩ le̩ te̩, oñ i adʼe̩wñ ele le̩ nʼo̩wo̩ amiejo o̩gba Jihofa, tak i adʼu wʼugbo ubo̩ iche̩bo̩;
tak atama le̩ abu e̩wñ ele le̩ nyʼo̩wo̩ʼka e̩ko̩ kʼi chʼe̩wñ urewa-wñ, oñ i agʼu jo oj ubo̩ iche̩bo̩ le̩, ubile̩ tak i aje̩ ñw onobule̩ ñmo̩ omi le̩.

Tak abu kʼi je̩ ñw u fʼomi le̩ ñmo̩ kpa, e̩gba le̩ iche̩wñ kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ daji, kʼi la fʼabi o̩ko̩-wñ je̩ ochochi tak omi ki aje̩ ñw ama mu le̩ agudu wʼefu-wñ kʼi ka nyʼefu, tak efu-wñ awu, uta-wñ la agbe̩ rinyo̩, oñ onobule̩ amud e̩ne̩ ina alumeji amone̩-wñ.
I muda che̩wñ kʼonobule̩ le̩ ma fʼo̩la-wñ daji n, kʼi la fe̩, e̩gbale̩ ma atʼo̩ no̩, oñ i anyʼefu.
Uko̩o̩la e̩do̩ ñwe̩le̩ñwe̩le̩ le̩ de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼonobule̩ kʼi nʼo̩ko̩ dʼe̩re̩ tinyo̩ kʼi la fʼo̩la-wñ daji,
abe̩k e̩gba kʼe̩do̩ ñwe̩le̩ñwe̩le̩ lewa bʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ ma, kʼi la chane̩ etejane̩ o̩ya-wñ; e̩gbale̩ tak i adʼonobule̩-wñ dago o̩gba Jihofa, oñ atama ache teju uko̩-o̩la-i chaka o̩la-wñ.
Tak e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ le̩ afe̩ bʼudu te̩, onobule̩ le̩ la ane̩ udu-wñ.
